channel.title: H.A.M area on a DS source
channel.description:
Wanted the H.A.M area 100% or so. ;D
Things needed to be done: H.A.M guys(and girls) stop noclipping through walls. 0%[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14oc2v4.jpg[/img] H.A.M dudes sitting in the EXACT spot as in RS! 100%[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2z6i7ba.jpg[/img] H.A.M dialogue like Runescape's. 0% (I don't KNOW how to add dialogue into a DS source, yet.) The trapdoor to get into area works with Pick-Pocket option! 50% [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mq5k47.jpg[/img] Custom interface that tells what you can do in the area, and gives you an insight about a quest I'm making. 100%[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2n9w4mt.jpg[/img] H.A.M say stuff like "Well said, brother." over their heads. 0% H.A.M pickpocketing. 0% (Haven't even bothered to start on this.) H.A.M deacon faces correct way/says stuff to the H.A.M followers. 0%[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/35227ib.jpg[/img]
[b]NOTE: THIS IS JUST THE FIRST DAY.[/b]

@waiter_8 wrote:

I think he blurred it so that people wouldn’t steal his creativity.

item.title: H.A.M area on a DS source
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

well too get them to talk you go in too the npchandler.java
Look for somthing like this then
if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {
npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();
}

then type somthing like this
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2828) { // npctype = npcID
if (misc.random(4) == 1) { // the misc.random is the how long till he says it
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “I sell Castle Wars Ticket rewards!”; //and of couse what you want him to say
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: H.A.M area on a DS source
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Wanted the H.A.M area 100% or so. ;D

Things needed to be done:
H.A.M guys(and girls) stop noclipping through walls. 0%
H.A.M dudes sitting in the EXACT spot as in RS! 100%
H.A.M dialogue like Runescape’s. 0% (I don’t KNOW how to add dialogue into a DS source, yet.)
The trapdoor to get into area works with Pick-Pocket option! 50%
Custom interface that tells what you can do in the area, and gives you an insight about a quest I’m making. 100%
H.A.M say stuff like “Well said, brother.” over their heads. 0%
H.A.M pickpocketing. 0% (Haven’t even bothered to start on this.)
H.A.M deacon faces correct way/says stuff to the H.A.M followers. 0%

NOTE: THIS IS JUST THE FIRST DAY.

Read full topic
